text: 2|191|avare kantumuttunnetatt vecc ninnalavare keannukalayukayum, avar ninnale purattakkiyetatt ninn ninnal avare purattakkukayum ceyyuka. (karanam, avar natattunna) marddanam kealayekkal nisthuramakunnu. masjidul haraminnatutt vecc ninnal avareat yud'dham ceyyarutâ€Œ; avar ninnaleat avite vecc yud'dham ceyyunnat vare. ini avar ninnaleat (avite veccâ€Œ) yud'dhattil erpetukayanenkil avare keannukalayuka. aprakaraman satyanisedhikalkkulla pratiphalam
